text: Love Comes Quietly is a 1973 Dutch Belgian Luxembourgian drama movie directed by Nikolai van der Heyde and starring Barbara Hershey, Ralph Meeker, Ward de Ravet, Sandy van der Linden. ==Other websites== * Category:1973 drama movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:Belgian drama movies Category:Luxembourgian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Nikolai van der Heyde
title: Love Comes Quietly
